projectDetail.name: Telegram AI Secretary Bot
projectDetail.description: A FastAPI-powered Telegram bot that acts as an AI secretary, helping you manage tasks, notes, and conversations using Google's Gemini AI model.
function: Powered by Google's Gemini AI model for natural language understanding

projectDetail.name: Telegram AI Secretary Bot
projectDetail.description: A FastAPI-powered Telegram bot that acts as an AI secretary, helping you manage tasks, notes, and conversations using Google's Gemini AI model.
function: Powered by Google's Gemini AI model for natural language understanding

projectDetail.name: IoT Visualization Project
projectDetail.description: A comprehensive IoT visualization system consisting of three main components: frontend interface, backend MQTT service, and device simulator.
function: Real-time communication between components via MQTT
Elegant and responsive design across all components

projectDetail.name: React + Supabase Task Manager
projectDetail.description: A modern task management application built with Vite, React, TypeScript, and Supabase. This project demonstrates real-time CRUD operations using Supabase as the backend.

projectDetail.name: Shopping Cart App
projectDetail.description: A modern shopping cart application built with Expo and React Native, featuring a clean UI.

projectDetail.name: SQLAlchemy Demo with FastAPI
projectDetail.description: A demonstration project showcasing the power of SQLAlchemy with FastAPI, using SQLite as the database.
function: User and Address models with one-to-many relationship

projectDetail.name: Task Manager with Rust and Actix-web
projectDetail.description: A simple task management web application built with Rust,demonstrating the use of enums, Actix-web framework,and Askama templating.
function: Display tasks with different categories (Work, Personal, Hobby)
Visual distinction between task categories using CSS styling
Type-safe task categorization using Rust enums

projectDetail.name: Calculator App
projectDetail.description: A modern calculator app built with Expo and React Native, featuring a clean design and support for basic arithmetic operations.
function: Basic arithmetic operations (add, subtract, multiply, divide)

projectDetail.name: Memory Game
projectDetail.description: A beautifully crafted memory card game built with modern web technologies. Test your memory by matching pairs of cards in this engaging and visually appealing game.

projectDetail.name: Secure Password Generator
projectDetail.description: A modern, secure password generator built with React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. This application generates strong 8-character passwords that meet common security requirements.
function: Ensures each password contains: At least one uppercase letter, At least one lowercase letter, At least one number, At least one special character (!@#$%^&*)
Modern, responsive UI with Tailwind CSS

projectDetail.name: 3D Collision Detection Simulator
projectDetail.description: A web-based 3D collision detection demonstration using Three.js and custom AABB (Axis-Aligned Bounding Box) implementation.
function: Responsive design that adapts to window resizing

projectDetail.name: Task Manager Application
projectDetail.description: A full-stack task management application built with React (frontend) and Go (backend). The application allows users to create, manage, and prioritize tasks with detailed attributes including deadlines, priorities, dependencies, and more.
function: Create, Read, Update and Delete Tasks

projectDetail.name: MQTT Publisher/Subscriber Example
projectDetail.description: A simple Node.js application demonstrating MQTT messaging using the MQTT.js library with a publisher and subscriber.
function: Publisher that sends messages to a specific MQTT topic
Subscriber that listens for messages on the specified topic
Uses the public MQTT broker at test.mosquitto.org
Simple error handling and connection status logging

projectDetail.name: React Three Fiber Product Card
projectDetail.description: An interactive 3D product showcase built with React Three Fiber, featuring a Game Boy model with dynamic lighting and controls.
function: 3D Game Boy model display with interactive rotation
Grid layout of multiple product cards

projectDetail.name: Dijkstra's Algorithm Visualization
projectDetail.description: An interactive web-based visualization of Dijkstra's shortest path algorithm. This project helps users understand how Dijkstra's algorithm works by providing a visual representation of the pathfinding process.
function: Visual representation of:- Node distances- Visited nodes- Final shortest path- Edge weights
Statistics display showing path length and visited nodes

projectDetail.name: Mouse Tail Effect
projectDetail.description: A interactive web visualization that creates a trailing effect following your mouse movements using Three.js. The effect generates small spheres that follow your mouse cursor's path, creating an ethereal trail in 3D space.
function: Responsive design that adapts to window resizing

projectDetail.name: React Native Task Manager
projectDetail.description: A modern, cross-platform task management application built with React Native and Expo. Features a clean, intuitive interface with support for dark/light themes and persistent storage.

projectDetail.name: Minesweeper Game
projectDetail.description: A classic Minesweeper implementation using HTML, CSS, and vanilla JavaScript. This web-based version features the traditional Minesweeper gameplay with a clean, modern interface.

projectDetail.name: Bugatti Tourbillon 3D Viewer
projectDetail.description: An interactive 3D viewer showcasing the Bugatti Tourbillon 2026 model using Three.js. The viewer features a rotating display platform, dynamic lighting, and orbital controls for user interaction.
function: Interactive 3D model viewing with orbit controls

projectDetail.name: Sorting Algorithm Visualizer
projectDetail.description: An interactive web-based tool for visualizing common sorting algorithms in action. This project helps users understand how different sorting algorithms work through visual representation.
function: Adjustable animation speed- Generate new random arrays

projectDetail.name: 3D Model Viewer with Three.js
projectDetail.description: A web-based 3D model viewer that displays a bracket model using Three.js. The viewer includes orbit controls for model interaction and proper lighting setup.
function: 3D model loading using GLTFLoader- Orbit controls for rotating, panning, and zooming
Responsive design that adapts to window resizing- Ambient and point lighting for better model visibility
Axes helper for orientation- Automatic camera positioning based on model size

projectDetail.name: Golang Unit Converter
projectDetail.description: A retro-styled unit converter web application with a Go backend and HTML/CSS/JavaScript frontend. Convert between different units of measurement with a nostalgic 80s computer aesthetic.

projectDetail.name: 3D Falling Objects Animation
projectDetail.description: A interactive 3D animation created with Three.js that demonstrates physics-based falling objects with shaking effects.
function: Interactive 3D scene with orbit controls for camera manipulation- Multiple geometric shapes (cube, pyramid, cylinder) with realistic materials
Physics-based animation sequence: 1. Objects shake for 3 seconds 2. Brief pause (1 second) 3. Sequential falling animation with gravity effects
Responsive design that adapts to window resizing

projectDetail.name: Three.js Dust
projectDetail.description: A dynamic 3D visualization of particles using Three.js, featuring a system of bouncing spherical particles with random motion.
